title: Something that should be added to sending gifts
body:
Ok I am a person who was recently gifted a r%%%%%ed amount of gifts from a person trying to buy my forgiveness and when they didn't get that they acted like a jerk and charge backed / refunded / returned the payments .... resulting in my account being suspended ... Riot should make a "DECLINE" option for gifts so this does not happen to another player....  I know that if the option was there I would NOT have accepted these gifts sending them back to that jerk and would still have my account....
just saying...
its something that should be considered

replies.body: yeahhh its been a while and still riot is not giving me my account back this is bull sh!t and what else is retarded is the fact that when i go to the repayments page it tells me i have $ 0 owed

so basically I'm screwed .... this is the response I got from the second ticket I created

Hello Summoner,

Unfortunately, we cannot remove the ban until it has been repaid. I would recommend speaking to the player who sent the gifts in order to get this resolved. Thank you for your understanding.

should have figured I would get such a generated response ... should have known riot wouldn't give two sh*ts about my situation .... 

THANKS RIOT for nothing ....
('^')

The [gifting center](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) has a few safety measures like eligibility requirements and confirmation to add some layers of protection.  Based on feedback, some [adjustments were also made](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/store-update/were-relaxing-gifting-restrictions) to provide improved accessibility.  I see that you're already chatting with a specialist through a ticket.  He will be able to help you out and get this sorted out for you.  Best of luck!
